content:
Pisek family

Hirschel Kalman PISEK (c1753 - Jan 9, 1813) was the son of Kalman Lewkowicz (c1730 - 1795-98) and Feigel. (Kalman later remarried to Mindel.) Hirschel married Rachel and they had at least 6 children. He remarried to Dwoyre. 

1 Hirschel Kalman PISEK             c1753 - Jan 9, 1813 #13
 + Rachel                           c1761 (Wolf)
  2x Chaim HIRSCHFELD               1779-80 - 1822 #262
    + Chaja Joseph GLEITZMAN        1781-86
          married Nov 16, 1799 Krakow
        FAMILY LISTING
  2o Feigel PISEK                   c1781 - 1817 #106
    * Abraham KLARMAN               c1780 - 1851 #181 {census family 121}
        FAMILY LISTING

2x Leibl Hirsch PISEK             1786-87 - Jul 16, 1840 #182
    + Keile Rachel HIRSCHBERG       1792-94 - Aug 2, 1835 #270
          married Mar 21, 1804 Krakow
     3o daughter PISEK              - Aug 12, 1811 #49c
     3o Friede PISEK                Jun 17, 1811 #69a
       * Jozef BLODE (BLEDE)        Jun 1, 1806 (p.134) Krakow - before Nov 1885
              married Jun 28, 1833 #68
            FAMILY LISTING
     3x Hersz PISEK                 Sep 1, 1814 #72

       + Judit FRUHLING             1827/28/36

          + Ernestine SELZER        1862
                married 1882 #3 Lwow
        4x Getzel PISEK             Apr 29, 1858 #1335
          + Cecylia /Sara Cyrla WIESENBERG  ?Jun 13, 1872 Raniowice
                married Dec 2, 1890 #30 Drohobycz
           5o Anna PISEK            Jun 20, 1894 #204 Drohobycz
           5x Karol PISEK           Dec 24, 1898 #439 Drohobycz - after 1948
             + Irena FROMOWITZ      Oct 22, 1902 #671 - after 1947
                   married Prog.Syn May 3, 1923 #676
              6x Wiktor PISEK       Feb 13, 1934 - after 1947
           5o Bronislawa PISEK      Sep 6, 1905 Mosciska
        4o Mary PISEK               Feb 1, 1860 #2422 - after 1912
          * Chaim (Joachim) WOHLMANN  Dec 22, 1862 (1863 #19) - after 1912
                 married Sep 27, 1885 #85
               FAMILY LISTING
        4o Keila PISEK (twin)       Jan 24, 1862 #13
        4o Rifka PISEK (twin)       Jan 24, 1862 #14
        4o Beila Ruchel PISEK       1862 - Feb 14, 1869 #67
        4x Hirsch (Henryk) PISEK    Nov 18, 1865 #547
          + Joanna SILBERSTEIN      Sep 17, 1879 Lwow

        4x Jakob PISEK              1870 #612 - Dec 15, 1873 #1027
        4x Josef PISEK              Mar 15, 1876 #193
          + Rosa KOHN               Jun 13, 1872
                married Feb 3, 1907 #18 Vienna

One of the genealogists with interest in this family is: Shiri Dori-Hacohen
